LanguageData.RoofTransparentFraming.label: transparent roofing
LanguageData.RoofTransparentFraming.description: Transparent roofing lets the light through, but keeps the weather out!
LanguageData.RoofSolarFraming.label: solar roofing
LanguageData.RoofSolarFraming.description: Solar roofing generates power on your roof. Requires a Solar Controller to function.
LanguageData.ThickStoneRoofFraming.label: thick stone roofing
LanguageData.ThickStoneRoofFraming.description: Provides a thick roofing to keep drop pods out.
